text: Onon [pisarxondaho]-ro ʙa padaronason nisʙat dihed, [ki] nazdi Alloh taolo odilonatar ast. Agar padaronasonro namesinosed, pas, onho ʙarodaroni dini va ʙardagoni ozodsuda [va dar hukmi dustoni] sumo hastand. Dar mavridi on ci [qaʙlan] istiʙoh kardaed, gunohe ʙar sumo nest; vale on ci dilhojaton qasdi onro dorad [va amdan ʙar zaʙon meovared, gunoh ast; pas, agar tavʙa kuned] hamvora Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
